property.name: dfs.datanode.vfp-client.jms.receiveTimeoutMillisec
property.description: VFP message receive timeout in milliseconds. After this, the VFP Client will consider the message lost.

property.name: dfs.datanode.vfp-client.jms.msgPriority
property.description: JMS message priority for VFP Client, 9 is max.

property.name: dfs.datanode.vfp-client.jms.msgTimeToLiveMillisec
property.description: Time-to-live in milliseconds for non-persistent messages.
